column2: Students provided appropriate ways to engage with the sources in the presentation. Pictures, images, videos, and/or audio were used in engaging and appealing ways.
Students have three sources that (accurately and evidently) support the information they provide in their presentation. The information is not copied, but conveyed in the words of the students.
Students demonstrate a clear understanding of each of the Elements of Hip Hop.
Presentation is a minimum of 8 slides, including a title slide, a summary slide, and the Resources slide.
